page.title: 17FOOTBALL VIOLENCE
page.content: There has just been a game on television in which more than 40 people were killed in Belgium. Everyone thinks this was terrible. When I go to see West Ham United play at Upton Park there is sometimes violence there. There is a gang which calls itself the 'Inter-City Firm', and they get into fights with supporters from other teams. They travel all over to see games and they usually have fights when they get there. They are just spoiling it for the rest of us. Some of my mates don't go to football any more because of the violence. It's good to sing and shout at football because that shows you support your team but there is no sense to having fights and kicking people for fun.
